statements: DELETE FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE id = 1 AND y_coordinate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE z_coordinate > 10 OR x_coordinate < -5;
DELETE FROM ARSimulations WHERE simulation_name = 'Simulation A';
DELETE FROM ModelCoordinates WHERE model_id = 100 AND x_coordinate = 10.5;
DELETE FROM models WHERE model_id = 1 AND model_name = 'Model A';
DELETE FROM ar_simulation_history WHERE model_id = 5 AND texture_id = 3;
DELETE FROM texture_mapping WHERE model_id = 5 AND texture_id = 3;
